title: r/Choosingbeggars Spoiled Brat Demands $500 For Doing The Dishes!
description:
r/Choosingbeggars Are you ready for one of the most spoiled kids on planet earth? This brat is furious at her parents because they won't give her money to buy Versace and Gucci luxury items. When people on Reddit suggest that she do chores for an allowance, this brat said that she thinks she deserves $500 just for doing the dishes! If you like this content, let me know by following this podcast for more daily Reddit content!
